Only thing we need to amend is the "Thankyou for booking" page that appears on the customers screen when they accept a booking. Joel is looking at that now. It needs the new logo as well

I've emailed Georgia, so she has these things on her list of to do, when we cut over to Novari

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath and Joel,

David and I are making some minor wording edits to the Ts and Cs on the Advantage quote platform, as well as to this page (see attached).

I logged in and found the Ts and Cs (and made those amendments) but I can't seem to find where this page is or how to edit it.

Can you let me know where it is? I'll make the changes from there onwards.

Cheers
Dan


Dan Gerber
MANAGING DIRECTOR
